interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Braven
Review Date: 2018/06/12
Categories: Suspense, Adventure, Action
Product Description: ['Jason Momoa stars in this intense action-thriller about a logger fighting for survival against drug traffickers who have stashed heroin in his hunting cabin.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Lin Oeding'], 'Producers': ['Jason Momoa', 'Mike Nilon', 'Molly Hassell', 'Brian Andrew Mendoza'], 'Starring': ['Jason Momoa', 'Zahn McClarnon', 'Jill Wagner']}
Review Text: Love Jason Momoa! This is a really good movie. Lots of action and thrills and some emotions. Has family sticking together and the “No One messes w my Child” from both parent point of views.
Review Title: Braven is action packed.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Thor [DVD] Chris Hemsworth (Actor), Natalie Portman (Actor), Kenneth Branagh (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['The world has many heroes...but only one is a god. When the arrogant warrior Thor (Chris Hemsworth, STAR TREK) is banished to the Earth from his homeworld of Asgard, he must fight to reclaim his lost powers. Pursued by an invasion force sent to destroy him, the fallen God of Thunder must rise to the battle and learn what it takes to become a true hero. Natalie Portman (BLACK SWAN) and Anthony Hopkins (BEOWULF) also star in the blockbuster adventure critics are calling "thrilling, entertaining and cool" (Harry Knowles, Ain\'t It Cool News).Note: This title does go though a manual rework process.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD11899700DVD', 'Director': 'Kenneth Branagh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 24, 2013', 'Actors': 'Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'MARVEL', 'Writers': 'Ashley Edward Miller, Zack Stentz, Don Payne, J. Michael Straczynski, Mark Protosevich', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} You could run across your own Super Hero like oh say, Chris Hemsworth! I mean "HELLO", I melt and he's just on a DVD or movie screen or walking down a Red Carpet, wherever makes no difference.

Of course this Thor is the same. Loves his family, his people, all the surrounding planets or in our world, surrounding States and Cities. A true Soldier/Warrior. Respect his parents and even loves his troublesome brother! I have to say I really like this Loki character. Yes he is bad and self enter. But got the attitude of Garfield the Cat and really comical. So yeah I don't think you can have a Thor flick without Loki. Together the brothers compliment each other, tho you wish Loki wasn't so destructive on humankind like he can be. Yes we have romance, anger, some really Ugly bad guys, a crazy Professior and comedy and unfortunately loss of a loved one. So Thor's like us and his home has problems as ours does and we too lose Loved Ones. He just does it with grace and one Heck of a hammer!!
Can't wait for the new Captian America coming to theaters 4/4/14!
Hope you enjoy Thor: The Dark World. Full of action!!
Dezi If only... Dracula Untold Luke Evans (Actor), Sarah Gadon (Actor), Gary Shore (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['The origin story of the man who became the enduring legend of Dracula is told in Dracula Untold, an epic action-adventure starring Luke Evans (Fast & Furious 6, The Hobbit series) in the title role. Gary Shore directs, and Michael De Luca produces.'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance, Gary Shore, Luke Evans', 'Initial release date': '2015-02-03', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MHV61129775DVD', 'Director': 'Gary Shore', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '1 hour and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 3, 2015', 'Actors': 'Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon, Dominic Cooper, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Just watch my Dracula w Luke Evans. First I am a fan of Luke. And he ain't to bad to look at either...know matter the age. LOL
I found the movie extremely interesting and thrilling at the same time.
Vlad the Impaler, his story is tweaked and told in a diffenert way that is...to me a better way of telling the history of such a wicked and Gruesome Dude! Sure glad I was not form that era.
There is Love. There is Honor. There is Family and a bond so strong it can not be broken at all...all the way to the end!
Speaking of the end I did not really care for the ending. Yes it leaves it open for another Dracula...But to me this story does not need a #2. Because it would truly ruin this one!
Yes I Loved the movie. Great effects and dialogue.
I still believe tho that if the ending would have had played out a little bit longer, it would not have left me hanging and finishing the ending for myself' This Drac could bite me anytime! Dezi Ga. Pacific Rim (Two-Disc Special Edition DVD) Charlie Hunnam (Actor), Idris Elba (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Spotlight Deals, Sci-fi & Fantasy ['Product Description', 'Pacific Rim (Special Edition) (DVD)', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', "If the prospect of two-plus hours of 250-foot mechanical men pummeling enormous alien creatures from another dimension is just what you've been waiting for, oh, boy, does Guillermo del Toro have a treat for you. The celebrated director--one might even say visionary--has pulled off the most elaborate B-movie heist ever with this huge-budget special effects extravaganza that revels in catchphrase cliché dialogue, a howlingly obvious script, and the most breathtaking homage to Japanese monster and mecha cinema, manga, and comic tradition. It's all by design, of course, and is a stunning spectacle that also acts as antidote to the bloated, self-important superhero genre and typical bombastic Hollywood tent-pole fare.", 'Pacific Rim', 'has plenty of bloat and bombast, mind you. But it\'s in the service of a wondrously geeky story that throws all logic and seriousness to the wind, transporting the viewer to a realm of childlike popcorn escapism no matter their age. A dense and breathless prologue dumps us into the near-future global warfare of Kaiju vs. Jaeger. Kaiju are reptilian monstrosities that emerge from deep in the sea through a portal that leads to a world where Kaijus are systematically bred to destroy. They annihilate coastal cities and claim millions of lives before the world\'s citizens band together to fight back. The humans build fantastic robots called Jaegers (German for fighters) that are able to vanquish the early Kaiju enemies by employing "pilots" who drive the mechanized behemoths in pairs, joining minds in a process known as the Drift. But as the years go by, the war has taken a toll on the humans and the Jaegers, both of whom are nearly defeated. From beginning to end there\'s really no point in asking questions or trying to calculate details about the outrageous goings-on in the world of', 'Pacific Rim', '. This is a pure thrill ride ruled by del Toro, the wild visual flair of his artistry and his sheer delight for wallowing in tropes and genre chestnuts leading at full volume. The cast is mainly window dressing for the astounding computer images. The pilots Charlie Hunnam, Max Martini, Rob Kazinsky, and Rinko Kikuchi are merely types. The same goes for Idris Elba, but his glowering presence as the unwavering commander is the best real-life thing about', 'Pacific Rim', '. A pair of nerdy scientists (Charlie Day and Burn Gorman) add to the plot (simple as it is), though their primary purpose is wacky comic relief. Del Toro favorite and', 'Hellboy', "himself, Ron Perelman steals his few short scenes as a bootlegger in Kaiju corpses. His character says a lot about the movie's self-effacing attitude.", 'Pacific Rim', 'is deeply in cahoots with itself over the ridiculousness of the story, but also delights in the awesomeness of its invention. The action is both coherent and mind-blowing, which is why most people will find it such a kick. Just like driving a Jaeger, throw your head into the battle and hang on. --', 'Ted Fry'] {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Ultraviolet, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Guillermo del Toro, Burn Gorman, Idris Elba, Clifton Collins Jr., Rob Kazinsky, Max Martini, Thomas Tull, Clifton Collins, Jr., Rinko Kikuchi, Callum Greene, Mary Parent, Ron Perlman, Travis Beacham, Jon Jashni, Charlie Hunnam, Charlie DayGuillermo del Toro, Burn Gorman, Idris Elba, Clifton Collins Jr., Rob Kazinsky, Max Martini, Thomas Tull, Clifton Collins, Jr., Rinko Kikuchi, Callum Greene, Mary Parent, Ron Perlman, Travis Beacham, Jon Jashni, Charlie Hunnam, Charlie Day See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 11 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000318101DVD', 'Director': 'Guillermo del Toro', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Ultraviolet, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Charlie Hunnam, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi, Charlie Day, Rob Kazinsky', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Guillermo del Toro, Callum Greene, Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Writers': 'Travis Beacham, Guillermo del Toro', 'Number of discs': '2'} Tho this movie has some great old and new actors, I'm afraid it did not meet the Great Scale for me. Some of the effects are pretty good. Others phony.
To me the movie started in the middle of a story and left me wanting to have the First Part so I could really understand Why? And How? It all began.
I bought it. And it was a waste of $$. Please feel free to borrow mine.

DeDe Ga Peaches Lemon compared to Ga Peach Cobbler Game of Thrones: The Complete Seasons 1-6 Format: DVD Movies & TV, HBO, All HBO Titles ['Game of Thrones: The Complete Seasons 1-6'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4.52 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Release date': 'November 15, 2016', 'Studio': 'HBO Studio', 'Number of discs': '6'} Hey 5 stars of course. They series IS a 5 star series period. The only gripe i have is a the case holders themselves. The way they lay on top of another disc makes getting them in or out hard to do without scratching the disc. And it seems all series that I have bought are coming in that case format. So be really careful when removing and returning the disc to their cases. 5 🌟 Stars of course! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Malcolm D. Lee'], 'Producers': ['Will Packer', 'Malcolm D. Lee'], 'Starring': ['Regina Hall', 'Tiffany Haddish', 'Larenz Tate'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']} SO FUNNY!!!! Girlfriends if you want a really funny “Adult” movie to watch together, or if you just need to laugh....this is for you! Recommend no children in or around the hearing or seeing area. Strong language and some sex parts. But if you can watch Fifty Shades, you can watch this. It’s sooo funny I watched it twice! Girls Trip {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jim Sheridan'], 'Producers': ['Noel Pearson', 'Rob Quigley'], 'Starring': ['Rooney Mara', 'Vanessa Redgrave', 'Eric Bana'], 'Studio': ['Vertical Entertainment']} This movie was so worth every second it ran. I didn’t want it to end. The Secret Scripture w Vanessa Redgrave and Eric Bana was a type of Mystery and Thiller. Mystery due to every twist and turn it takes you thru to reach it Thrilling conclusion. I’d watch this again and again. Talking about Happily Ever After....great movie! They now also admire the craft of actors such as Rooney Mara and Vanessa Redgrave, reflecting a growing diversity in their cinematic tastes.

- **Rating Systems:** The user persistently seeks high-rated films, showing a refined ability to recognize meaningful storytelling, particularly in action and emerging comedic narratives. Their expectations have become elevated based on their increasing sophistication in film analysis.

- **Critical Engagement:** Their latest review showcases an enthusiasm for films that blend action, suspense, and emotional elements, indicating a preference for narratives that captivate and engage fully.

- **Anticipation of Releases:** The user remains excited for upcoming releases, actively participating in film communities and seeking emotionally resonant narratives, further demonstrating their passion for rich storytelling across genres.

Overall, the user exemplifies an evolving appreciation for narratives that blend thrilling action with emotional storytelling, alongside diverse comedic elements.
